hero.name: Teketsel Beyene
hero.tagline: Experienced Java Developer | Spring Boot, AWS | Agile (SCRUM) | Available for Full-time W-2 Employment | Willing to Relocate

about.title: About me
about.description: Experienced Java Developer with a proven track record of delivering robust software solutions and spearheading successful data pipeline migrations to the AWS Cloud. Equipped with extensive expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, REST API, and J2EE, complemented by adeptness in frontend development using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. An Agile practitioner who excels in collaborative environments, driving efficiency and innovation through agile methodologies.

experience.title: Software Developer
points: Created an enterprise-level billing system utilizing Spring Boot and React, resulting in a 30% decrease in billing errors and a 25% increase in overall billing accuracy. Successfully deployed the application on AWS cloud services.

experience.title: Full Stack Java Developer
points: Developed a comprehensive event management system as part of a collaborative team effort, utilizing various technologies across the entire SDLC.
Utilized Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, React, and PostgreSQL to implement front-end and back-end functionalities.

experience.title: Software Engineer
points: Built Spring Boot microservices for core payment workflows (fund transfers, bill payments, refunds) and exposed secure REST APIs.
Designed a real-time fraud detection module using Apache Kafka for event streaming and Resilience4j for fault tolerance.
Optimized PostgreSQL (financial records) and MongoDB (fraud logs), improving query performance by 25%.
Developed React dashboards for customers (payment tracking) and admins (fraud alerts, KPIs), integrated with Tableau for reporting.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, containerized services with Docker, and deployed on AWS EC2/RDS.
Implemented system monitoring and observability with Prometheus and the ELK Stack.

services.name: Full Stack Java Development
services.description: 6+ years of professional experience building scalable full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, React, Angular, and REST APIs.
additionalInfo: Created enterprise billing and event management systems with Spring Boot, React, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Integrated third-party APIs to expand application capabilities.
Improved testing efficiency by 30% with JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

services.name: Microservices & API Engineering
services.description: Designed and implemented resilient, domain-driven microservices architectures with Spring Cloud, Kafka, and REST APIs.
additionalInfo: Developed payment workflows (fund transfers, refunds, bill payments) for fintech platforms.
Implemented OAuth 2.0, Spring Security, and JWT authentication for secure APIs.
Applied Netflix Hystrix & Resilience4j to ensure system reliability under heavy load.

services.name: Cloud & DevOps Engineering
services.description: Hands-on expertise in AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD automation for scalable deployments.
additionalInfo: Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, GitLab, and Docker, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Deployed production workloads to AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, EKS).
Implemented monitoring and observability with Prometheus, ELK Stack, and Grafana.

services.name: Data & Messaging Systems
services.description: Optimized large-scale data processing and streaming pipelines for enterprise applications.
additionalInfo: Built Spring Batch jobs for high-volume API requests and concurrent data processing.
Leveraged Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, and ActiveMQ for real-time messaging and analytics.
Improved database performance with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB optimizations.

services.name: IT Risk Management & Security
services.description: Applied modern security practices to safeguard sensitive data and ensure compliance.
additionalInfo: Implemented OAuth 2.0 authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).
Applied rate limiting and circuit breakers for API protection.
Designed auditing and logging solutions to meet IT governance standards.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.subtitle: Java Developer
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce platform with Spring Boot microservices and a React frontend. Includes product catalog, cart/checkout, order tracking, and JWT auth.
projects.problem: Legacy monolith caused slow releases and frequent checkout failures at peak traffic.
solution: Decomposed into domain microservices (catalog, cart, orders, payments)
Implemented REST APIs with Spring Boot, secured with JWT
Containerized with Docker; CI/CD via Jenkins to AWS
PostgreSQL for transactional data; S3 for media assets

projects.title: Billing System for City
projects.subtitle: Java Developer | React
projects.description: Municipal billing system handling invoices, payments, adjustments, and reporting with role-based access and audit logs.
projects.problem: Manual billing and spreadsheet-based reconciliations led to errors and delayed collections.
solution: Built billing, payments, and reconciliation services with Spring Boot
React admin UI with RBAC and activity auditing
Automated CI/CD pipeline and blue/green deploys on AWS

projects.title: Event Management
projects.subtitle: Java Full-Stack Developer
projects.description: End-to-end application for creating events, registrations, ticketing, announcements, and email notifications.
projects.problem: Fragmented tools for registration and communication created poor attendee experience.
solution: Unified event creation, ticketing, and attendee management
Async notifications with Kafka and templated emails
Stored assets on S3; used MongoDB for flexible event data
Built responsive React UI for organizers and attendees

projects.title: Cyber Threat Intelligence Platform
projects.subtitle: Software Developer
projects.description: A platform that collects, analyzes, and visualizes cybersecurity threat intelligence data to proactively defend against attacks.
projects.problem: Security teams relied on fragmented logs and manual analysis, making it difficult to detect and respond to threats in real-time.
solution: Developed ingestion pipelines with Kafka to process millions of events daily
Built Spring Boot microservices for parsing, enrichment, and threat classification
Stored threat data in MongoDB and Elasticsearch for fast querying and visualization
Implemented Angular dashboards for SOC analysts with real-time alerting
Deployed on AWS with Docker and Kubernetes for scalability and resilience
